byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

headline.main: The Rise and Fall of the Bush Campaign

keywords.value: Right to Rise Policy Solutions Inc
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Only a year ago, he was a favorite to clinch the Republican nomination. But as Iowa voters prepare for their caucuses, he barely registers in the polls.
lead_paragraph: Only a year ago, he was a favorite to clinch the Republican nomination. But as Iowa voters prepare for their caucuses, he barely registers in the polls.
